short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Right-click to read aloud selected text (currently English only). NOTE: other installed extensions might cause interference.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Right-click on selected text and choose 'Read This (English)' to have it read to you aloud whether you don't know how to pronounce a word or have the need to hear the text instead of reading it. Note: some other extensions might interfere with its functionality.
